Sentence.sentence: As recent graduates can testify, the job market isn't kind to candidates who can't demonstrate genuine competence, along with a well-cultivated willingness to work hard.

Still, at the most selective schools, where thousands of candidates may submit identically high grades and test scores, a marginal item like the essay may serve as a tie-breaker between two equally qualified candidates.
hire the most suitable candidates to work for them
At the moment candidates are selected on a fairly narrow set of criteria such as prior academic and career performance, and analytical and problem solving abilities.
Professor Gauthier believes schools should not just be selecting candidates from traditional sectors such as banking, consultancy and industry
Those who had watched Obama's acceptance speech as the Democrats' presidential candidate performed just as well, on average, as the white subjects.
She will vote for another candidate.
Oh, I can't decide right now because I have to find out more about the other candidates.
W : Mark is the best candidate for chairman of the student's union , isn't he ?
Mark is the best candidate for the post of chairman

Also last year, Farrant and colleagues published a detailed molecular study of another candidate, Xerophyta viscosa, a tough-as-nail South African plant with lily-like flowers, and she says that a genome is on the way.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: So, despite all the talk about drone deliveries to your doorstep, all the retail executives expressing anxiety over consumers going online, and even a Presidential candidate exclaiming that Amazon has a " huge antitrust problem, " the Census data suggest

Sentence.sentence: All tests require a potential candidate with whom to compare DNA.
For years executives and headhunters have adhered to the rule that the most attractive CEO candidates are the ones who must be poached.
But it can also be antagonistic such as when a political candidate tums toward their competitor during a debate and makes eye contact that signals hostility.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Dr simonsohn found if the score of the previous candidate in a daily series of interviewees was 0.75 points or more higher than that of the one before that, then the score for the next applicant would drop by an average of 0.075 points.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: This might sound small, but to undo the effects of such a decrease a candidate would need 30 more GMAT points than would otherwise have been necessary.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

means.word_mean: 申请求职者, 候选人

sentences.en: He interviews many candidates for jobs.
sentences.cn: 他面试过很多求职者。

means.word_mean: 最后命运或结局如何已显然可见者

entry.def: A candidate is someone who is being considered for a position, for example someone who is running in an election or applying for a job.

example.ex: The Democratic candidate is still leading in the polls...
example.tran: 民主党候选人的得票数依然领先。

example.ex: He is a candidate for the office of Governor...

entry.def: A candidate is someone who is taking an examination.
A candidate is someone who is studying for a degree at a college.
entry.tran: 攻读学位者;在读本科生(或硕士生、博士生)

entry.def: A candidate is a person or thing that is regarded as being suitable for a particular purpose or as being likely to do or be a particular thing.
entry.tran: 适合…的人(或物);可能有…结局的人(或物)

example.ex: I think Birmingham City are prime candidates for relegation next season...
example.tran: 我认为下个赛季伯明翰城队最有可能降级。

example.ex: Those who are overweight or indulge in high-salt diets are candidates for hypertension.
example.tran: 体重偏高或口味偏咸者易患高血压。

means.word_mean: 1. a politician who is running for public office
2. someone who is considered for something (for an office or prize or honor etc.)

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin candidatus 'white-robed', also denoting a candidate for office (who traditionally wore a white toga), from candidus 'white'

sentences.cn: 投票者喜欢那些平易近人的候选人.
sentences.en: Voters like a candidate who has the common touch.

sentences.cn: 他认为自己是合适的人选.
sentences.en: He figured himself as a good candidate.

sentences.cn: 那最后一位候选人对公司活动的了解给我留下了深刻的印象, 他确实做了充分的准备工作.
sentences.en: That last candidate impressed me with his knowledge of the company's activities; he has really done his homework.

sentences.cn: 那位候选人在南方出人意料地大为得手.
sentences.en: The candidate made surprising inroads in the South.

sentences.cn: 当问到他是不是候选人时, 他不置可否.
sentences.en: Asked if he was a candidate, he refused to commit himself.

sentences.cn: 候选人大肆吹嘘,一旦他当选将要如何如何.
sentences.en: The candidate spoke in a bombastic way of all that he would do if elected.

sentences.cn: 第三个候选人已经加入角逐共和党提名的行列.
sentences.en: A third candidate has entered the contest for the Republican nomination.

sentences.cn: 那个候选人是一个说大话的懦夫, 他决不会有胆量为任何事业挺身而出.
sentences.en: That candidate is an ass in a lion's skin, he would never have the courage to stand up for any cause.

sentences.cn: 他自告奋勇要当候选人.
sentences.en: He offered himself as a candidate.

sentences.cn: 这位候选人佯装生病,以回避参与一些争论性的问题.
sentences.en: The candidate tried to run away from controversial issues by pretending to be ill.

sentences.cn: 市长候选人答应清洗警察部门.
sentences.en: The mayoral candidate has promised to purge the police department.

sentences.cn: 那位候选人的形象因丑闻而受到严重损害。
sentences.en: The candidate was seriously damaged by the sleaze factor.

sentences.cn: 该候选人还未上任就遭指责违背诺言。
sentences.en: The candidate stands accused of breaking promises even before he's in office.

sentences.cn: 接替他工作的首要人选是玛格丽特·拉姆齐。
sentences.en: Prime candidate to take over his job is Margaret Ramsay.

sentences.cn: 候选人是否与业主有组织关联?

sentences.en: I consider that he is the best candidate.

sentences.cn: 短期内, 两位候选人在这方面都难有所建树.
sentences.en: In the short term, neither candidate can do much.

sentences.cn: 这位候选人有很好的家庭背景.
sentences.en: The candidate has a good family background.

sentences.cn: 所有事情奥林匹克, 包括的标识语, 吉祥物, 地点, 和出价候选人的信息.

sentences.cn: 选拔和招聘的做法,是与查明和聘用适当资格的候选人.
sentences.en: Selection and recruitment practices are concerned with identifying and hiring the appropriately qualified candidates.

sentences.cn: 他为保护弱者权益而进行的斗争的履历使他成为民主党的理想候选人.
sentences.en: His record of fighting guy makes him an ideal Democratic candidate.

sentences.cn: 两位候选人都来征求我对选举得意见.
sentences.en: Both candidates solicited my opinion about the election.

sentences.cn: 我们将为每一个职位举荐最适合的候选人.
sentences.en: We make sure we only put forward candidates are well suited for each role.

sentences.cn: 他必须尽快回到他们身边等他的候选人一醒过来他就可以恭喜他们.
sentences.en: He'd go back to them shortly when they awoke to congratulate the candidates.

sentences.cn: 每一个候选人走到他跟前,他都说几句.
sentences.en: He said a few words to each candidate as he came up.

sentences.cn: 记者们向候选人问个不休.
sentences.en: Reporters plied the candidate with questions.

sentences.cn: 我们的候选人被预言讲义绝对优势取胜.
sentences.en: Our candidate is predicated to win by a landslide.

sentences.cn: 我已把你的名字作为最合适的候选人呈交上去了.
sentences.en: I have sent your name forward as the most suitable candidate.

sentences.cn: 两位候选人最终成为总统职位竞争者.
sentences.en: Two candidates are emerging as contestants for the presidency.

sentences.cn: 候选人发出了三个大的邮件.
sentences.en: The candidate sent out three large mailings.

sentences.cn: 而某日突然,临毕业的学生在旷课期间竟摇身一变,成了诺贝尔奖的候选人.
sentences.en: Rightof the blue , seniors about to graduate suddenly become candidates for the Nobel Prize in Absenteeism.

sentences.cn: 那候选人已经轻易地在选举中获胜.
sentences.en: The candidate has walked away with the election.

sentences.cn: 这名候选人希望获得最多一百万张选票.
sentences.en: The candidate was hoping to collect up to one million votes.

sentences.cn: 6月24日国民党推荐马英九作为它的候选人.
sentences.en: The KMT endorsed Ma as its candidate on June 24.

sentences.cn: 候选人可撤销任何类别的代理人的委任.
sentences.en: Candidate may revoke the appointment of any type of agent at any time.

sentences.en: He also added: " I certainly do not hold or attend private dinners for candidates. "

sentences.en: The candidate will take an oral examination.

sentences.cn: 具有一般的经济学知识及个性主动的应试者最佳.
sentences.en: Candidates who a general knowledge of economics and a self motivated personality will be most suitable.

sentences.cn: 每个应试者都必须达到一定的体格标准.
sentences.en: Every candidate for entry has to come up to a certain physical standard.

sentences.cn: 要求所有应试者保持考场肃静.
sentences.en: Silence is required of all examination candidates.

sentences.cn: 不论应试者是否是强有力的应聘人, 我总会问他们有什么问题.
sentences.en: Whether or not candidates are strong contenders, I always ask whatquestions they have for me.

sentences.cn: 应试者须热心学习并能接触电脑.
sentences.en: A desirable candidate should be eager to learn and have no allergy to computers.

sentences.cn: 面试是为了挑选最有发展前途的应试者.
sentences.en: The interviews is to cream off the most promising candidates.

sentences.cn: 主考人员刷掉了一半的应试者.
sentences.en: The examiners plowed half the candidates.

sentences.cn: 心态放松的应试者是自信的.
sentences.en: A relaxed job candidate is a confident job candidate.

sentences.cn: 要给应试者希望, 不要当场就说他不行.
sentences.en: Give the candidate a hope. Don't fail him on the spot.

sentences.cn: 主考人员刷掉了一半应试者.
sentences.en: The examiners ploughed half the candidates.

sentences.cn: 请把考卷发给应试者.
sentences.en: Give out the examination papers to the candidates, please.

sentences.cn: 应试者须愿意承担责任.
sentences.en: Candidates should be willing to assume responsibilities.

sentences.cn: 那个应试者已通过所有的考试.
sentences.en: The candidate has passed all the tests.

sentences.cn: 这意味着应试者会在完成任务方面取得低分.
sentences.en: This means that the candidate will get a low score in task fulfillment.

sentences.cn: 面试过所有应试者之后, 我们选定了汤姆.
sentences.en: After interviewing all the candidates, we've decided on Tom.

sentences.cn: 这个消息可能会使预备的欧盟申请人如土耳其, 克罗地亚和塞尔维亚失望.
sentences.en: That news may disappoint prospective EU candidates, such as Turkey, Croatia and Serbia.

sentences.cn: 答: 我司确实有一套筛选加盟申请人的指引.
sentences.en: A: We do have a set of criteria for evaluating candidates.

sentences.cn: 我们将会接见超过60位新申请人,并进行面试.
sentences.en: We will be orienting and interviewing more than 60 new candidates.

sentences.cn: 无论申请人是否被录取, 上述申请材料恕不退还.
sentences.en: Whether the candidates are accepted or not, all the application materials will not be returned.

sentences.en: Your experience as a sales assistant puts you one up on the other candidates.

sentences.cn: 向每位申请人都讲授了安全知识。
sentences.en: Each candidate is given instruction in safety.

sentences.cn: 我们和数名申请人进行了面谈，但都没有给我们留下什么印象。

Sentence.sentence: Compare those excellent letters with a merely good letter: The candidate was productive,or intelligent,or a solid scientist or something that's clearly solid praise, but nothing that singles out the candidate as exceptional or one of a kind.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C
